Chamaleon:

Chamaleon leaded the way to quarters' area. All room had a name and a 
number written on door.The thin-bot arrived in front of two that 
hadn't name. "Well " said the bot "Here are your quarters... you can 
decorate them as you like... if you like talk with other bot with out 
leave the room  you just have to type the number of the quarter in 
comm link, the comlink is inside, and the bot that rest there will 
answer... Do you need something else?"
